explains: n. [内科] 中毒；陶醉；喝醉

sentences.en: Intoxication interferes with speech and coordination.
sentences.cn: 醉酒影响言语能力和协调性。

sentences.en: Intoxication interferes with memory and thinking, speech and coordination.
sentences.cn: 醉酒影响记忆、思考，讲话和协调性。

sentences.en: They speak of the sky-pervading sorrow which lowers in the darkness of clouds; the speechless deep intoxication of the forest-roaming spring.
sentences.cn: 它们诉说着黑云中沉下的漫天哀愁；诉说着春天在漫步于森林中时的无言的深深沉醉。
